fullq.subject: physics
fullq.question: Debbie pushes a 10-kilogram box of books with a horizontal force of 500 newtons. What is the acceleration of the box, giving your answer in standard SI units, if friction is neglected?
fullq.answer: 50 METERS PER SECOND SQUARED (ACCEPT: 50 METERS PER SECOND PER SECOND)

fullq.subject: biology
fullq.question: In what part of photosynthesis, named after its discoverers, is NADPH used to produce 3-carbon sugar phosphate molecules?
fullq.answer: CALVIN CYCLE (ACCEPT: CALVIN-BENSON CYCLE or CALVIN-BENSON- BASSHAM CYCLE)

fullq.question: For every carbon dioxide molecule fixed in the Calvin-Benson cycle, how many NADPH molecules are utilized?

fullq.subject: math
fullq.question: What is the specific name for a common tangent that intersects the segment joining the centers of 2 circles?
fullq.answer: INTERNAL COMMON TANGENT (ACCEPT: INTERNAL or INTERNAL TANGENT)

fullq.question: Name all of the following 3 transport systems that directly require energy to operate: active transport; facilitated diffusion; sodium potassium pump
fullq.answer: ACTIVE TRANSPORT; SODIUM POTASSIUM PUMP (ACCEPT: ALL BUT FACILITATED DIFFUSION)
